articles.title: Bitcoin and ether ETFs see outflows ahead of Christmas, led by IBIT and ETHE
articles.mainIdea: Bitcoin and ether ETFs see outflows ahead of Christmas, led by IBIT and ETHE
articles.summary: CoinDesk: Bitcoin and ether ETFs see outflows ahead of Christmas, led by IBIT and ETHE. The biggest single-day exit came from BlackRock’s IBIT, which saw $91.37 million leave the fund. Grayscale’s GBTC followed with a $24.62 million outflow. Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, ETH-USD, IBIT, SOSO-USD.

articles.title: Nvidia Absorbs Another Rival for $20B, Boosting Decentralized AI
articles.mainIdea: Nvidia Absorbs Another Rival for $20B, Boosting Decentralized AI
articles.summary: BeInCrypto: Nvidia Absorbs Another Rival for $20B, Boosting Decentralized AI. Nvidia pays $20B for Groq's AI chip assets, continuing its pattern of absorbing rivals and strengthening the case for decentralized alternatives. Related tickers mentioned: CSCO, GOOG, GROQ.PVT, NVDA, SSNLF.

articles.title: BlackRock’s Expanding Crypto ETF Push Could Be A Game Changer For BlackRock (BLK)
articles.mainIdea: BlackRock’s Expanding Crypto ETF Push Could Be A Game Changer For BlackRock (BLK)
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: BlackRock’s Expanding Crypto ETF Push Could Be A Game Changer For BlackRock (BLK). In recent months, BlackRock has deepened its push into digital assets and ETFs, highlighted by strong inflows into its iShares Bitcoin Trust and Ethereum products, and a global hiring drive across New York, London, and Singapore to build out crypto and tokenization capabilities. This broadened digital-asset footprint, alongside continued ETF innovation, is increasingly positioning BlackRock as a key bridge between traditional institutional capital and emerging crypto market... Related tickers mentioned: ETH-USD, IBIT.
